item.title: Colour clicking help please
item.dc:creator: @Surajd Surajd
item.description:
@Surajd wrote:

Here is an Example Script I will whip up:

[code]Program ExampleSD;

Var
x,y :Integer;

Const
RColor = 60325; // Let’s say 60325 is the Road Color
RTol = 5; // Let’s say the tolerance to find the Road Color is 5

Procedure Clikme;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,RColor,1,2,100,023,RTol))then
Movemousesmooth(x,y);
wait(50 + Random(10/2+9));
ClickMouse(x,y,True); // True for left click, False for right click
end;

Begin
ClikMe;
Writeln(‘Example by Surajd’);
End.[/code]

If you still don’t understand, that is why we have the Tutorials Section

Read full topic
